post:
We are proud to announce that we have launched pure SSD openvz plans in Las Vegas. The first 20 orders will receive 30% recurring discount for life on the SSD Openvz plans. To get the discount please use the coupon code "**GN83E49LVX**"

**Other Offers**

> **Double Disk Space  OR  Double RAM OR  Double Bandwidth on LETKVM / LETOVZ plans**

**Hostnode Specs**

**[KVM]**

Dallas Texas, Incero

`CPU : Xeon E5-2620 @ 2.10GHz | RAM : 128 GB | HDD : 2 x 240 GB SSD + 4 x 4TB | Port 1Gbps`

**[OpenVZ]**

Turkey, Radore

`CPU : Xeon E31230 @ 3.20GHz | RAM : 32 GB | HDD : 2 x 4 TB | Port : 1Gbps`

**[SSD OpenVZ]**

Las Vegas, VegasNAP

`CPU : Xeon E31230 @ 3.30GHz | RAM : 32 GB | HDD : 2 x 256 GB SSD | Port : 1Gbps`

**[All Plans Include]**

    • INSTANT SETUP!
    • 24/7 Support
    • No long term contracts
    • SolusVM VPS Management Portal
    • Unlimited Reboots/Reinstalls
    • Fully Managed
    • Root Access
    • Raid Based Storage

**LETKVM**

    75 GB Raid 10 Disk Space
    2 GB RAM / 2 GB vswap
    4 CPU Cores
    1 TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
    2 IPV4
   
 **$7.00/Month**

**[Order Now](https://secure.ultimatehostings.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=73)**

**Test IP's**

**Dallas** : 23.227.189.2 | **Turkey** : 31.210.106.34 | **Las Vegas** : 5.226.170.86

**DD TEST**

**Dallas** 

    [root@dallas2 ~]# dd if=/dev/zero of=test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync
    16384+0 records in
    16384+0 records out
    1073741824 bytes (1.1 GB) copied, 2.61308 s, 411 MB/s

**Las vegas**

    [root@lv ~]# dd if=/dev/zero of=test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync
    16384+0 records in
    16384+0 records out
    1073741824 bytes (1.1 GB) copied, 2.61642 s, 410 MB/s
